item.title: AWS brings multi-agent orchestration to Bedrock
item.description: New capabilities in Amazon Bedrock now lets enterprises build a multi-agent workflow and an orchestrator agent to manage it all.

item.title: What AI vendor should you choose? Here are the top 7 (OpenAI still leads)
item.description: A review of 29 vendors put OpenAI at the top, but 2025 will see demand for a mix of proprietary, open source and small AI models.

item.title: These are the most in-demand tech jobs hiring right now
item.description: According to LinkedIn’s latest report, software engineer, full stack engineer and application developer are in the top 10 roles.

item.title: Liquid AI’s new STAR model architecture outshines Transformer efficiency
item.description: The STAR framework leverages evolutionary algorithms and a numerical encoding system to balance quality and efficiency in AI models.

item.title: Hume launches Voice Control allowing users and developers to make custom AI voices
item.description: Hume focuses on providing tools for creating unique, expressive voices that align with user needs, such as customer service chatbots.
